page.title: 16ANDREW'S SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: WE USUALLY READ OR WRITE OUR DIARIES,NOBODY WRITES A GOOD DIARY,WE NORMALLY HAVE BETTER THINGS TO TALK ABOUT ON THE MONDAY MORNING. THE FIRST LESSON IS MATHS. THIS ISN'T TOO BAD I SUPPOSE, ALTHOUGH THE WORK IS HARD. NEXT LESSON IS CREATIVE DESIGN, I'M NOT VERY GOOD AT CRAFTS AND ONLY REALLY ENJOY COOKERY AND POTTERY. HALF WAY THOUGH, EDWARD AND I GO AND PLAY OUR SAXAPHONES WITH A SPECIAL TEACHER. AFTER DINNER IS HUMANITIES I ENJOY THIS ( BUT I WOULDN'T SAY I ADORE IT ) LAST LESSON IS SCIENCE THIS IS ONE OF MY FAVOURITES AND I AM NOT BAD AT IT. AFTER LAST LESSON I GO HOME. I USUALLY DO MY HOMEWORK FIRST. AFTER TEA I GO INTO CHADESDEN FOR MY PIANO LESSONS THIS USUALLY LASTS ABOUT TWENTY MINUTES. THEN I GO PLAY WITH MY FRIENDS.
